author: Fox News
title: Stefanik asks Twitter to report Biden for ‘disinformation’ in previous Putin tweet
description: Rep. Elise Stefanik, R-N.Y., asked Twitter to label a previous President Biden tweet about his toughness on Russian President Vladimir Putin as "disinformation" amid the escalating Russia-Ukraine crisis.
